Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ XLCellReference() [1/5]

OpenXLSX::XLCellReference::XLCellReference ( const std::string &  cellAddress = "")

Constructor taking a cell address as argument.

Parameters
cellAddressThe address of the cell, e.g. 'A1'.

The constructor creates a new XLCellReference from a string, e.g. 'A1'. If there's no input, the default reference will be cell A1.

◆ setAddress()

void OpenXLSX::XLCellReference::setAddress ( const std::string &  address)

Set the address of the XLCellReference.

Parameters
addressThe address, e.g. 'A1'
Precondition
The address input string must be a valid Excel cell reference. Otherwise the behaviour is undefined.
